urls.title: Draft EA hazardous waste wood guidance welcomed - letsrecycle.com
urls.description: Draft proposals from the Environment Agency as part of its hazardous waste wood classification project no longer require the separation of fence posts and decking at household waste and recycling centre (HWRCS). In an update, the Wood Recyclers Association (WRA) executive director Julia Turner said that after â€œextremely positiveâ€ discussions with the Environment Agency, the most recent proposals are for...
